attributes.action: recognise that Great Britain is a union of England, Scotland, Wales, and Northern Ireland and if the Scottish Parliament decide upon a referendum as to whether Scotland becomes independent then this petition seeks a vote on the issue by all residents within the union and not Scotland alone.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In a union such as the United Kingdom one part should not be the decision maker on the breaking up of this union of countries. Should a referendum be held then all UK citizens should have a vote on the matter as it affects all of us.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
